title: Happy Hour: The No Good, Awful, Very Bad Day
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
• Today was not a good day for one Madison homeowner, who reported an armed robbery at his house and subsequently was busted for drug possession when the cops showed up. Live and learn. [WSMV]
  • A woman who set herself on fire in the parking lot of a Nashville church back in November has died after setting herself on fire in the same church parking lot this past Sunday. [WTVF]
  • One hundred and twenty five Johnson Controls, Inc. (Columbia, TN) employees were laid off today. Merry Christmas? [WSMV]
  • You probably wouldn’t have guessed it, but we’ve seen some pretty bad wrecks with these low temperatures and freezing rain. It’s not like we have bad drivers in Nashville, or anything… [WKRN]
